thread.title: Will Smith Has His Work Cut Out in the Freakish First Trailer for ‘Bright’
thread.title_full: Will Smith Has His Work Cut Out in the Freakish First Trailer for ‘Bright’

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Will Smith Has His Work Cut Out in the Freakish First Trailer for ‘Bright’
text:
Netflix continues to roll out its original content , this time with a sword-wielding Will Smith in the first trailer for upcoming fantasy flick Bright. 
In an unorthodox move, the brief teaser was previewed last night during the 89th Academy Awards . At 30-seconds long, it’s hard to get a proper gauge of the wider storyline, but what we do know is that Smith will (once again) assume the role of a cop in a preternatural world where humans co-exist alongside weird-looking elves and shotgun-yielding orcs. And no, we’re not talking about the state of Georgia.
Bright was directed by Suicide Squad’s David Ayer (gulp) and also stars Joel Edgerton and Noomi Rapace. Look out for it hitting the streaming platform later this year.
In related news, here’s every show coming to and leaving Netflix in March.
